item.title: Charlatans of Web3
item.description: Web 3.0, commonly referred to as Web3, has become quite the catchphrase on the internet. For those of you who don’t know what Web3 is, it’s a proposed iteration of the World Wide Web based on the Blockchain technology. Tech communities across several platforms have been bandwagoning it as if it will be the ultimate form of the Internet that fuels our lives. I don’t feel this way; in fact I have a lot of concerns due to the nature of Blockchain technologies – more on this later.
